title: RT News - October 09, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Violent anti-austerity protests in Ecuador see the government relocate from the capital. The country's former president tells RT that economic mismanagement is to blame for the unrest. As the US is roundly condemned for abandoning its Kurdish allies in Syria we look at how the decision was somewhat predictable. A new US intelligence committee report contradicts the findings of the Mueller probe into alleged collusion between Donald Trump and the Kremlin - by claiming Moscow 'did' help him in 2016.
description: Violent anti-austerity protests in Ecuador see the government relocate from the capital The country's former president tells RT that economic mismanagement is to blame for the unrest
